posts.post_content:
Paypal F&F or will take check/m.o. but must wait for payment to clear.  

Not certain I'm wanting to sell it, but have had enough people ask if i'm wanting to sell any of these, so would take best offer over $600 by end of day, otherwise I'll just hold unto it.   Emails only, will have more limited time to be on here today. 

Lobert Kotton SGC 35
